definition: powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

sentences.english: The earthquake occurred in tectonically "stable" area belongs to new fracture.
sentences.chinese: 构造“稳定”区发生的强震属于新破裂。

sentences.english: The event in 1597 was doubted as a strong earthquake in Bohai.
sentences.chinese: 对1597年地震事件作为一次渤海强震提出了质疑。

sentences.english: There is an annual coupling between flood and earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 福建洪涝与强震具有年耦合性。

sentences.english: The real-time processing technique of strong ground motion data is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对强震观测数据的实时处理技术进行了研究。

sentences.english: We study the space evolvement course of seismic activity before medium-strong earthquakes in Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 研究了新疆中强震前地震活动空间演化过程。

sentences.english: The death toll from the devastating quake had reached 795.
sentences.chinese: 目前，智利强震死亡人数已达795人。

sentences.english: The quantitative method is to calculate the passing-away rate of strong earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 定量的方法即强震消逝率的计算方法。

sentences.english: Strong earthquakes successively occurred on the eastern and western parts of the Eurasian belt.
sentences.chinese: 亚欧带东段和西段继续发生强震。

sentences.english: The generating and propagating mechanism of the precursory infrasound of earthquake are primarily explained.
sentences.chinese: 初步解释了强震前兆次声波的产生机理和传播机制。

sentences.english: A sequence of weak earthquakes closely spaced in time is generally followed by an ensuing strong earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 密集分布的弱震往往伴随有续发性强震。

sentences.english: The national palace and the headquarters of the United Nations mission in Haiti also collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 海地总统府和联合国海地特派团总部都因强震倒塌。

sentences.english: That a big shake-out is coming is in little doubt.
sentences.chinese: 只有极少数人怀疑强震的必发性。

sentences.english: In addition, both of them display certain anomalies before moderate-strong earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 同时在中强震之前，两者都有一定的异常与之对应。

sentences.english: The earthquake do the country raze to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 强震把这个都市夷为平地。

sentences.english: Moderate strong earthquakes are main activity in eastern China continent.
sentences.chinese: 中国大陆东部地区的地震活动以中强震为主。

sentences.english: A moderate earthquake occurred in El Salvador causing great losses.
sentences.chinese: 萨尔瓦多的一次中强震造成很大损失。
